name: Search_Hotels_By_Coordinates

docs_row.name: Search_Hotels_By_Coordinates
docs_row.func_description: Search for hotels around a given geographical coordinates.

latitude.description: Latitude of the searched location. latitude can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/locationToLatLong(Location to Lat Long) endpoint in Meta collection.

longitude.description: Longitude of the searched location. longitude can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/locationToLatLong(Location to Lat Long) endpoint in Meta collection.

arrival_date.description: The date on which you will arrive or check-in

departure_date.description: The date of departure or check-out.

radius.description:
The hotels that are within the radius. The radius is measured in kilometers.
Default is set to 100.
Range is between 10 to 500.

adults.description: The number of guests who are 18 years of age or older. The default value is set to 1.

children_age.description:
The number of children, including infants, who are under 18.
Example:
Child 1 Age = 8 months
Child 2 Age = 1 year
Child 3 Age = 17 years
Here is what the request parameter would look like:
children_age: 0,1,17

room_qty.description: The number of rooms that are required. The default value is set to 1.

units.description: The measurement of distance in metric or imperial.

temperature_unit.description:
The temperature unit in Fahrenheit or Celsius.
c = Celsius
f = Fahrenheit

languagecode.description:
To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages
) endpoint in Meta collection.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

location.description: location can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLocations(Get Location) endpoint in Meta collection.

latitude.description: Latitude of the searched location. latitude can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/locationToLatLong(Location to Lat Long) endpoint in Meta collection.

response_summary:
Here’s a summary of the hotel search results for your stay in India:  

There are 4,270 available properties matching your criteria, with three standout options highlighted.  

First, the **Cherryleen Resort Nagaon** is a 3-star hotel in Nagaon, priced at ₹19,440 (approx. $227) for five nights. It has received excellent feedback, with an 8.7 rating from 44 reviews, and offers free cancellation, a swimming pool, and free parking. Check-in is from 12:00 PM, and check-out is until 11:00 AM.  

Next, the **Palette Palghar Irayos Resort Lifestyle Retreat** near Mumbai is a 5-star retreat with a superb 9.1 rating from 26 reviews. The discounted rate is ₹15,095 (approx. $176), down from the original ₹16,896 (approx. $198). It also allows free cancellation and has a check-in time starting at 12:00 PM.  

Lastly, the **Wabi Sabi Resort in Igatpuri** is a 4-star property with a 7.6 rating from 48 reviews. It offers a mobile-exclusive discount, bringing the price down to ₹34,560 (approx. $404) from the original ₹38,707 (approx. $453). This resort also features a swimming pool and free parking, with check-in between 2:00 PM and 6:00 PM.  

All three properties are highly rated and provide flexible cancellation policies. You can filter your search further by budget, bed preferences, or room facilities.
enhance_func_desc: This API is ideal for travelers looking for hotel accommodations near specific geographic coordinates. It searches and filters hotels based on location, date range, and guest preferences, including price range, room quantity, and guest ages. The response includes detailed hotel information such as ratings, prices, amenities, and cancellation policies. Latitude and longitude must be obtained from the LocationToLatLong API.

enhanced_parameters.latitude: Geographic latitude for hotel search, sourced from locationToLatLong API.
enhanced_parameters.longitude: Geographic longitude for hotel search, sourced from locationToLatLong API.
enhanced_parameters.arrival_date: Check-in date for hotel booking (YYYY-MM-DD format).
enhanced_parameters.departure_date: Check-out date for hotel booking (YYYY-MM-DD format).
enhanced_parameters.adults: Number of adult guests (18+ years, default: 1).
enhanced_parameters.price_min: Minimum price filter for hotel rates.
enhanced_parameters.price_max: Maximum price filter for hotel rates.

primary_count.description: Total number of available properties matching the search criteria.

count.description: Total number of available properties matching the search criteria (same as primary_count).

filters.description: List of available filters for refining the search results.

title.description: Human-readable title for the filter (e.g., 'Your budget (for 5 nights)').

page_loading_threshold.description: Threshold for loading additional results as the user scrolls.

applied_filters.description: List of filters currently applied to the search results.

b_max_los_data.description: Data related to the maximum length of stay (LOS) allowed.

default_los.description: Default maximum length of stay in days.

has_extended_los.description: Flag indicating if extended length of stay is available (1 = yes, 0 = no).

extended_los.description: Extended maximum length of stay in days.

experiment.description: Identifier for the experiment related to extended stays.

max_allowed_los.description: Maximum allowed length of stay in days.

is_fullon.description: Flag indicating if the property is fully booked (1 = yes, 0 = no).

extended_count.description: Number of extended stay properties available.

has_low_availability.description: Flag indicating if there is low availability for the search criteria.

children.description: List of children in the room configuration.

adults.description: Number of adults in the room configuration.

unfiltered_count.description: Total number of properties available before applying filters.

unfiltered_primary_count.description: Total number of primary properties available before applying filters.

default_wishlist_name.description: Default name for the wishlist where the hotel can be saved.

id.description: Unique identifier for the property card.

extended.description: Flag indicating if the property is an extended stay option (1 = yes, 0 = no).

review_score_word.description: Human-readable description of the review score (e.g., 'Fabulous', 'Superb').

is_genius_deal.description: Flag indicating if the property is a Genius deal (1 = yes, 0 = no).

default_language.description: Default language for the property details.

soldout.description: Flag indicating if the property is sold out (1 = yes, 0 = no).

unit_configuration_label.description: Label describing the unit configuration (e.g., 'Hotel room: 1 bed').

preferred.description: Flag indicating if the property is a preferred option (1 = yes, 0 = no).

review_score.description: Numeric review score of the hotel (e.g., 8.7, 9.1).

children_not_allowed.description: Flag indicating if children are not allowed (null = not specified).

preferred_plus.description: Flag indicating if the property is a preferred plus option (1 = yes, 0 = no).

city_in_trans.description: Translated city name where the hotel is located.

min_total_price.description: Minimum total price for the stay in the hotel's currency.

main_photo_url.description: URL of the main photo of the hotel.

class_is_estimated.description: Flag indicating if the star rating is estimated (1 = yes, 0 = no).

block_ids.description: List of block identifiers for the property.

is_tpi_exclusive_property.description: Flag indicating if the property is exclusive to TPI (1 = yes, 0 = no).

bwallet.description: Details about the property's eligibility for B-Wallet.

hotel_eligibility.description: Flag indicating if the property is eligible for B-Wallet (1 = yes, 0 = no).

has_free_parking.description: Flag indicating if the property offers free parking (1 = yes, 0 = no).

latitude.description: Latitude coordinate of the hotel's location.

has_swimming_pool.description: Flag indicating if the property has a swimming pool (1 = yes, 0 = no).

currencycode.description: Currency code for the property's pricing (e.g., 'INR').

is_smart_deal.description: Flag indicating if the property is a smart deal (1 = yes, 0 = no).

urgency_message.description: Message indicating urgency (e.g., 'Only 1 left at this price on Booking.com').

cant_book.description: Flag indicating if the property cannot be booked (null = not specified).

longitude.description: Longitude coordinate of the hotel's location.

countrycode.description: Country code where the hotel is located (e.g., 'in' for India).

hotel_include_breakfast.description: Flag indicating if breakfast is included (1 = yes, 0 = no).

is_geo_rate.description: Flag indicating if the rate is geo-specific (empty = not specified).

is_no_prepayment_block.description: Flag indicating if no prepayment is required (1 = yes, 0 = no).

hotel_has_vb_boost.description: Flag indicating if the property has a visibility boost (1 = yes, 0 = no).

badges.description: List of badges associated with the property.

text.description: Text displayed on the badge (e.g., 'Mobile-only price').

review_nr.description: Number of reviews for the hotel.

main_photo_id.description: Unique identifier for the main photo of the hotel.

is_free_cancellable.description: Flag indicating if the booking is free cancellable (1 = yes, 0 = no).

composite_price_breakdown.description: Detailed breakdown of the pricing for the stay.

value.description: Numeric value of the gross amount per night.

currency.description: Currency of the gross amount per night (e.g., 'USD').

gross_amount.description: Total gross amount for the stay.

value.description: Numeric value of the total gross amount.

currency.description: Currency of the total gross amount (e.g., 'USD').

all_inclusive_amount_hotel_currency.description: All-inclusive amount in the hotel's currency.

value.description: Numeric value of the all-inclusive amount.

items.description: List of items included in the price breakdown.

name.description: Name of the item (e.g., 'Goods & services tax', 'Service charge').

details.description: Additional details about the item (null = not specified).

value.description: Numeric value of the item amount.

benefits.description: List of benefits associated with the booking.

icon.description: Icon for the benefit (null = not specified).

details.description: Details about the benefit (e.g., 'You’re getting a reduced rate compared to the rate available on a computer or laptop.').

value.description: Numeric value of the additional charges.

translated_copy.description: Translated copy for the additional charges (empty = not specified).

value.description: Value for the configuration (e.g., 0 = no, 1 = yes).

included_taxes_and_charges_amount.description: Amount of included taxes and charges.

amount_unrounded.description: Unrounded amount of included taxes and charges (e.g., 'US$0').

value.description: Numeric value of the included taxes and charges.

currency.description: Currency of the included taxes and charges (e.g., 'USD').

amount_rounded.description: Rounded amount of included taxes and charges (e.g., 'US$0').

has_long_stays_monthly_rate_price.description: Flag indicating if the property has a monthly rate for long stays (1 = yes, 0 = no).

has_long_stays_weekly_rate_price.description: Flag indicating if the property has a weekly rate for long stays (1 = yes, 0 = no).

value.description: Numeric value of the all-inclusive amount.
Numeric value of the net amount.

gross_amount_hotel_currency.description: Gross amount in the hotel's currency.

value.description: Numeric value of the gross amount.

excluded_amount.description: Amount excluded from the total price.

value.description: Numeric value of the excluded amount.

city.description: City where the hotel is located.

last_reservation_data.description: Data about the last reservation for the property.

last_reservation_ellapsed_months.description: Number of months since the last reservation.

distances.description: List of distances to nearby points of interest.
